TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents settings that control the behavior of the named pipe connection pool.
Gets or sets the group name of the connection pool group on the client.
Docs.value: The name of the connection pool group on the client. The default name is "default".

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default value can be changed to isolate the connections for a particular client into separate groups.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.
Docs.value: Returns a structure that indicates the maximum time the connection can be idle in the connection pool before being disconnected.
Docs.exception: The value is less than zero.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool.
Docs.value: The maximum number of allowed outbound connections for each endpoint that is cached in the connection pool. The default value is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This limits the number of connections that are cached for each unique endpoint. If this value is exceeded by having more active client connections, then the service may appear unresponsive to the client and this value should be adjusted to exceed the maximum number of expected connections that are cached for each unique endpoint.

Docs.exception: The value is less than or equal to zero.
